name: INNJOY Agencia de Innovación y Desarrollo
membership:
- European Innovation Partnership (EIP) on Active and Healthy Aging (AHA)
- European Innovation Partnership on Smart Cities and Communities
goal: Innjoy (Innjoy Agencia de Innovación y Desarrollo, S.L.) is a SME based in Barcelona (Spain), that promotes and facilitates human-centred innovation. Its competence areas are design-thinking, business model innovation and strategy, research and new technologies (IOT, Smart Cities and AAL). Innjoy is committed to develop innovative, sustainable and market oriented solutions; person-centered, age friendly and smart products, services and environments that enhance people’s quality of life, improve wellbeing, health and social care in Europe and create value for the stakeholders that want to leverage the opportunities presented by the rapidly rising population of ageing consumers.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- EIPonAHA European Innovation Partnership on Active and Healthy Aging
- AAL Ambient Assisted Living Joint Program
- European Innovation Partnership on Smart Cities and Communities
